title: Grum

|   | A tough-looking gnoll, wearing the pelt of one of his former war dogs. |

*For a list of all gnolls, see [list of gnolls](/List_of_gnolls "List of gnolls").* *Not to be confused with [Grunn](/Grunn "Grunn").*

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Grum the Hunter** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") gnoll who comes with a pack of [wolves](/Wolves "Wolves") and a two-handed [polearm](/Polearm "Polearm").

Grum is an alternate version of [Grunn](/Grunn "Grunn"). Only one may spawn in a given game.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):8-11
- [The Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"):1

## Tips & Tricks

- While Grum isn't that tough on his own, his wolves can seriously complicate things, especially if you give him the opportunity to use his reaching weapon against you from a safe distance. Use narrow hallways to prevent that, but avoid giving Grum opportunities to hit you with that polearm. Alternatively, if you don't mind getting bit a few times, the amazing speed of his wolves makes it very easy to lure them away from their master and take them out in relative safety on the next floor up.
- Neither Grum nor his pets have decent [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") or high [HD](/HD "HD"). [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") and [status effect](/Status_effect "Status effect") [wands](/Wand "Wand") of all sorts work very well against them.

## History

- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), Grum ran with a pack of [war dogs](/War_dog "War dog").

Grum g 
HP 26-54
HD 4
XP 189
Speed 10
AC 4
EV 9
Will 10
Attack1 20 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type gnoll, gnoll
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Male
A tough-looking gnoll, wearing the pelt of one of his former war dogs.

For a list of all gnolls, see list of gnolls. Not to be confused with Grunn.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Grum the Hunter is a unique gnoll who comes with a pack of wolves and a two-handed polearm.

Grum is an alternate version of Grunn. Only one may spawn in a given game.

Location

  • The Dungeon:8-11
  • The Lair:1

Tips & Tricks

  • While Grum isn't that tough on his own, his wolves can seriously complicate things, especially if you give him the opportunity to use his reaching weapon against you from a safe distance. Use narrow hallways to prevent that, but avoid giving Grum opportunities to hit you with that polearm. Alternatively, if you don't mind getting bit a few times, the amazing speed of his wolves makes it very easy to lure them away from their master and take them out in relative safety on the next floor up.
  • Neither Grum nor his pets have decent willpower or high HD. Hexes and status effect wands of all sorts work very well against them.

History

  • Prior to 0.13, Grum ran with a pack of war dogs.

==Useful Info==
'''Grum the Hunter''' is a [[unique]] gnoll who comes with a pack of [[wolves]] and a two-handed [[polearm]].

Grum is an alternate version of [[Grunn]]. Only one may spawn in a given game.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:8-11
*[[The Lair]]:1

==Tips & Tricks==
*While Grum isn't that tough on his own, his wolves can seriously complicate things, especially if you give him the opportunity to use his reaching weapon against you from a safe distance. Use narrow hallways to prevent that, but avoid giving Grum opportunities to hit you with that polearm. Alternatively, if you don't mind getting bit a few times, the amazing speed of his wolves makes it very easy to lure them away from their master and take them out in relative safety on the next floor up.
*Neither Grum nor his pets have decent [[willpower]] or high [[HD]]. [[Hexes]] and [[status effect]] [[wand]]s of all sorts work very well against them.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], Grum ran with a pack of [[war dog]]s.
